about_the_game:
The soundscapes of Night Loops. A haunting and immersive sonic experience that plays a crucial role in shaping the world’s eerie atmosphere and psychological tension.

Each track was carefully mixed to be a distinct, unlooped version of what you have experienced in-game. Recommended to be listened to with headphones. And preferably within a dark room.

This full soundtrack includes both mp3 and high-quality WAV files.

short_description: A journey through the psyche. Welcome to the Seaside Hotel, where the final hour of your night shift awaits as you tend to the guests, explore their dreams, and delve into the Self – time and again. A true dark adventure all while reliving the time before dawn, forever.
